code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{page,total,size,onPageChange}=_ref;const totalPages=Math.ceil(total/size);const createPages=()=>{const pages=[];const visible=5;let start=Math.max(1,page-2);let end=Math.min(totalPages,start+visible-1);if(end-start<visible-1){start=Math.max(1,end-visible+1);}for(let i=start;i<=end;i++){pages.push(i);}return pages;};const pages=createPages();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onPageChange(1),disabled:page===1,children:"\xAB"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onPageChange(page-1),disabled:page===1,children:"\u2039"}),pages.map(num=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onPageChange(num),className:page===num?'active':'',children:num},num)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onPageChange(page+1),disabled:page===totalPages,children:"\u203A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onPageChange(totalPages),disabled:page===totalPages,children:"\xBB"})]});};export default Pagination;
